2645d064-0da3-44e9-a7fb-b331bbf2bdb6.code:
const type = context.component?.props?.['type'] || context.component?.variables?.['popupType'] || 'default'
    if (type === 'delete') return 'lucide/trash-2'
    if (type === 'approve') return 'lucide/check-circle'
    if (type === 'warning') return 'lucide/alert-triangle'
    return 'lucide/help-circle'

f70b7d97-220a-4c86-b656-d624deced39c.code:
const type = context.component?.props?.['type'] || context.component?.variables?.['popupType'] || 'default'
    if (type === 'delete') return '#fecaca'
    if (type === 'approve') return '#bbf7d0'
    if (type === 'warning') return '#fed7aa'
    return '#dbeafe'
